message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a solution for monitoring stochastic phenomena using mobile robots, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The solution involves modeling the dynamics as a Gaussian Process and adapting the belief on the covariance structure over time, which involves machine learning techniques (cs.AI). The paper also proposes a decentralized approach for maximizing entropy on a set of informative regions, which involves optimization and control theory (cs.SY). The simulations involve processing and analyzing spatio-temporal data, which could fall under computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the paper uses Monte Carlo methods for sampling and adaptation, which could fall under machine learning or statistics (cs.LG).
